name: Firefox Edge-Pro theme
description: A nice minimalistic theme for Firefox inspired by Microsoft Edge. You can change your homepage motto before installing the style.
additional_info: to get the full experience: ● Install Lobster Font ● Install CTR ● Import These settings to CTR ● For Bookmark Folder icons you can just use EmoJis as bookmark folder names. ● If your Homepage is set to another page, go to "about:preferences" and change it back to "about:home" ● To rearrange the bookmarks and search bar's placement, simply use the Customize option on the menu. ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ ○ IMPORTANT NOTE: this version is not compatible to the new stylish. however you can roll back to version 2.1.1 of stylish and use this theme until the it's updated.
